commit.message: Bump version 0.8.1
Fixed typo in README
Bump version 0.8
Marked incompatible with flake8 >=3.7.0, announced discontinuation
Bump version 0.7
Add README contents as long_description
Include LICENSE and tests in source distributions
Don't test on Python 3.3 anymore, as it fails due to incompatible tooling
Explicitly document semantics of glob patterns (fixes #8)
README: improve note about X100 error
Bump version 0.6

Use pathmatch instead of fnmatch

The corelib module fnmatch isn't meant for matching path names but only
filenames. Using fnmatch to translate glob patterns caused foo*bar.py
to unexpectedly match paths like foo/baz/bar.py, for example.

Therefore we switched to the third-party module pathmatch, which translates
glob patterns in a way that * and ? don't match the path seperator,
and therefore gives expected results when matching against path names.
Bump version 0.5

Use bash glob patterns instead of "grep -P" for compatibility with macOS

On macOS, grep doesn't support Perl regular expressions (-P), which we used
for the tests, in order to match the NUL character after replacing newlines,
so that we could match against the whole output and not only line by line.

After all it seems somwhat simpler and more portable to use bash and compare
the output against a glob pattern.
Require a leading slash for paths relative to the root

Reorder Python versions for Travis CI

If you don't explicitly specify a Python version for the flake8 environment it uses
the one listed first. It is preferable to run flake8 on a newer than older version.
Sort error codes to identify redundant ignores through matching prefixes
Bump version 0.4
Replace slashes in paths with OS-depdendent directory separator (fixes #2)

Don't install package into "flake8" venv

We don't need to have flake8-per-fie-ignores installed to lint our own code.
Bump version 0.3
Report X100 also if listed error is redundant with noqa comments
Run tests also on PyPy
Lint code on Travis CI seperately
Allow X100 to be ignored per file
Fixed URL un setup.py
Bump version 0.2
Allow glob patterns for filenames (fixes #1)
Added PyPi badge and refer to example in the README
Initial commmit
